meanings.definition: The highest point of a hill.
meanings.sent1: From the hilltops, you can see very far.
meanings.sent2: The sun sets beautifully behind the hilltops.
meanings.sent3: The birds love to perch on the hilltops and sing their songs.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like the hilltops in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The hilltops were bathed in golden light as the day ended.

meanings.sent1: We hiked to the hilltops and had a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The clouds cast shadows on the hilltops below.
meanings.sent3: The hilltops looked like giant hats on the landscape.
meanings.sent4: The hilltops stood proudly against the blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The hilltops were covered in a blanket of green trees.
